alert.note: Alert for Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Clay County through 515 PM EDT... At 459 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kingsley, or 7 miles east of Starke, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Middleburg, Kingsley, Camp Blanding, Penney Farms and Asbury Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
